name: Ast-R-oid
description:
Important note:

IF YOU START THE GAME, IT IS VERY LIKELY TO LAG QUITE A BIT.  AFTER ALL PARTICLES HAVE BEEN LOADED ONCE IT WORKS FLUIDLY !
* Did not have time to fix it :(

This game is made for the WOWIE JAM 3.0

This is a game made for the game jam WOWIE 3.0 and was made for the topic of "Failure is progress". I had not much time for creating it, so don't expect too much from it :D

What is it about?

You have lost your spaceship and are now floating around in space. You have to avoid the asteroids and try to survive for as long as possible.

Controls

navigate down
navigate up
navigate left
navigate right
accelerate
deaccelerate
